{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$1.4M in 2020-2021** on contracts with UNIVERSAL HELICOPTERS.

Across 46 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 10 have at least one amendment (22%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 76% and the average number of amendments was 2.1. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$6.3M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.38 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$222.6K. The longest contract was 4.76 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$6.0M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
